name: Authenticating with Zupass: Office Hours
description:
If you're interested in learning how to gate your digital application to Zuzalu residents/visitors, or want to brainstorm ideas to build on top of Zupass, come by Office Hours! You can also head over to [Zupass] Dev Discussion on Telegram (https://t.me/+SvPVlRVeo303MDRh) for more information.


This session takes place in the DOME during the Public Goods Hackathon.
